prompt: Create a glassmorphic card component for a DeFi dashboard showing ETH balance. It should look premium and iOS-native with blur effects.
expectations: Uses BlurView or backdrop-filter for glass effect
Includes text contrast overlay for readability

prompt: Build a bottom sheet modal component for transaction details, following iOS design patterns. Should slide up from bottom with spring animation.
expectations: Slides from bottom (not top or center)

prompt: Create an iOS-style grouped list for app settings with proper sections, separators, and navigation chevrons.
expectations: Includes section headers in uppercase gray

prompt: Design a button component with iOS-style haptic feedback and scale animation on press. Should have primary and secondary variants.
expectations: Implements scale animation on press (0.95 scale)
Uses spring animation for press feedback
Has secondary variant (transparent with blue text)
Font weight 600 for primary, 400 for secondary

prompt: Create a navigation header with glassmorphism that blurs content scrolling underneath, iOS style.
expectations: Proper iOS header height (44pt + safe area)
Includes back button on left (iOS convention)

prompt: Build an input form with iOS-native styling including floating labels and validation states.
expectations: Uses iOS input background color (#F2F2F7 light mode)
Auto-capitalize settings appropriate for input type

prompt: Create a card component with liquid glass effect for iOS 26, showing crypto portfolio stats with smooth morphing between states.
expectations: Uses LiquidGlassView or equivalent iOS 26 API
Has proper spacing for element merging (20pt)

prompt: Design a pull-to-refresh component with iOS-style activity indicator and proper gesture handling.
expectations: Indicator appears at top of scroll view

prompt: Create an accessible tab bar navigation with iOS design, icons, labels, and proper active states.
Build a micro-interaction for a like button with iOS-style spring animation and color transition.
